html: "What would you do if elected to increase the funding of National Parks?" I don't want to see privatization of the parks. They are one of our national treasures and we need to make sure we protect them and fully fund them. #mssen #BariaforMississippi
text:
"What would you do if elected to increase the funding of National Parks?"

I don't want to see privatization of the parks. They are one of our national treasures and we need to make sure we protect them and fully fund them.

#mssen #BariaforMississippi

html: We have a question about the VA and steps the Trump Administration has taken "The President is taking steps to try and undermine the VA to privatize it. We need to shore up the VA and make sure our veterans are cared for." #mssen #BariaforMississippi
text:
We have a question about the VA and steps the Trump Administration has taken

"The President is taking steps to try and undermine the VA to privatize it. We need to shore up the VA and make sure our veterans are cared for."

#mssen #BariaforMississippi

html: "What is your stance on legalizing marijuana?" I am for legalization of medical marijuana and for decriminalization of small amounts of marijuana. I have seen too many young lives wasted bc of these laws. #mssen #BariaforMississippi
text:
"What is your stance on legalizing marijuana?"

I am for legalization of medical marijuana and for decriminalization of small amounts of marijuana. I have seen too many young lives wasted bc of these laws.

#mssen #BariaforMississippi

html: I will not privatize Social Security and I will not privatize Medicaid. I would repeal and replace this tax cut that was passed. The 1% don't need that tax cut, the middle class are the ones who need it. #mssen #BariaForMississippi
text:
I will not privatize Social Security and I will not privatize Medicaid.

I would repeal and replace this tax cut that was passed. The 1% don't need that tax cut, the middle class are the ones who need it.

#mssen #BariaForMississippi

html: Day 1 I will work on changing the language of the ACA to make expanding Medicaid mandatory. Mississippi is one of the states that did not expand Medicaid and it has been a disaster. #mssen #BariaForMississippi
text:
Day 1 I will work on changing the language of the ACA to make expanding Medicaid mandatory. Mississippi is one of the states that did not expand Medicaid and it has been a disaster. 

#mssen #BariaForMississippi

html: "What are your top 3 priorities?" Healthcare and education. And that order is not 1 and 2 or 2 and 1. They are equal. And then infrastructure. #mssen #BariaForMississippi
text:
"What are your top 3 priorities?"

 Healthcare and education. And that order is not 1 and 2 or 2 and 1. They are equal.
And then infrastructure.

#mssen #BariaForMississippi

html: I am against separating children from their families. And I disagree completely with the idea of a wall. It is a 15th century solution for a modern day problem. #mssen #BariaForMississippi
